name: MajorDepressiveDisorderActive
title: Major Depressive Disorder-Active
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent major depressive disorders that are active.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with major depressive disorder diagnoses.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes major depressive disorders in remission.)
